mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a. NAME AS "name", a.auth_url AS "authUrl", a.auth_icon AS "authIcon" FROM sys_auth a where a.auth_type='1' order by a.seq
SELECT a.`name` AS "name", a.auth_icon AS "authIcon", a.auth_value AS "authValue", a.auth_url AS "authUrl" FROM sys_auth a WHERE a.parent_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.seq
